statements: UPDATE communication_logs SET message = 'New message', encryption_key = '123456' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE communication_logs SET sender_name = 'Alice', receiver_name = 'Bob' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET sender_name='Alice', receiver_name='Bob', message='Hello World!' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE communication_logs SET encryption_key='abc123', sender_name='Alice', receiver_name='Bob' WHERE log_id=2;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET encryption_key = 'new_key' WHERE message_id = 101;
UPDATE message_logs SET receiver_id = 202, timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = 201;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET message_text = 'New secret message', encryption_key = 'new_key' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE message_logs SET receiver_id = 10, sender_id = 5, timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET message_text = 'Updated message text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE sender_accounts SET public_key = 'New public key' WHERE sender_id = 2;
UPDATE encrypted_messages SET message_text = 'New message content' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE sender_accounts SET public_key = 'Updated public key' WHERE sender_id = 5;
UPDATE communication_logs SET receiver_id = 3, timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE log_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE communication_logs SET sender_id = 1001, receiver_id = 2002, encrypted_message = 'Updated message' WHERE log_id = 12345;
UPDATE encryption_keys SET encryption_key = 'NewKey2022' WHERE user_id = 3003 AND key_id = 56789;
UPDATE encrypted_logs SET message = 'Updated message' WHERE log_id = 'c376ea2f-b3ec-4b6f-82be-1133a7d83efd';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = '19b85a18-1701-4c4e-8d67-3dbc4e7203c8';
UPDATE encrypted_logs SET sender = 'Alice', receiver = 'Bob' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'alice@example.com', created_at = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
